newsitem.title: UK: Lufthansa to up ex-UK cargo rates 5 pct from Apr 1.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa to up ex-UK cargo rates 5 pct from Apr 1.

text.p: Lufthansa Cargo AG will increase its ex-UK cargo rates by an across-the-board average of five percent from April 1, its UK and Ireland director Bob Bingley told Reuters.
Notice of the company's intention to raise its cargo rates globally came last November when it pointed to a dramatic and sustained fall in cargo rates in recent years.
Chairman Wilhelm Althen said then: "The rate rises are imperative in the face of the continuing downswing of between three and four percent annually in average yields in the air cargo industry.
Bingley said that although ex-UK rates would go up by varying amounts on different routes, the average rise would be five percent.
